title: Dangerous To Me
body:
[Am] You and me, we can be
The [C] honey and the [G] bee
[Am] Come to me, play with me
And [C] be my fanta[G]sy

In the [F] pouring rain
Come [G] on and set me free
Cause we [F] are the same
To[G]night it's for [D] real

  [Am] Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
  [G] You are dangerous to me
  [Am] Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
  [G] Yeah yeah yeah

Ooh let me [Am] drown in you, just fall into
A [C] deeper shade of [G] blue
You make me [Am] feel so good, I knew you would
You [C] know just what you've got to [G] do

Now it [F] feels as if you're taking [C] over me
So [E] can't you see
That you're [G] dangerous to [D] me

  [Am] Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
  [G] You are dangerous to me
  [Am] Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
  [G] Yeah yeah yeah

In the [F] pouring rain
Come [G] on and set me free
Cause we [F] are the same
To[G]night it's for [D] real

  [Am] Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
  [G] You are dangerous to me
  [Am] Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
  [G] Yeah yeah yeah

Now it [F] feels as if you're taking [C] over me
So [E] can't you see
That you're [G] dangerous to [D] me

  [Am] Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
  [G] You are dangerous to me
  [Am] Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
  [G] Yeah yeah yeah
bodyLyrics:
You and me, we can be
The honey and the bee
Come to me, play with me
And be my fantasy

In the pouring rain
Come on and set me free
Cause we are the same
Tonight it's for real

Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
You are dangerous to me
Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
Yeah yeah yeah

Ooh let me drown in you, just fall into
You make me feel so good, I knew you would
You know just what you've got to do

Now it feels as if you're taking over me
So can't you see
That you're dangerous to me

Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
You are dangerous to me
Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
Yeah yeah yeah

In the pouring rain
Come on and set me free
Cause we are the same
Tonight it's for real

Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
You are dangerous to me
Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
Yeah yeah yeah

Now it feels as if you're taking over me
So can't you see
That you're dangerous to me

Dam dam dam do di do di dam dam
You are dangerous to me

Yeah yeah yeah
